bug.author: kparichay
bug.summary: GstTensorFilterProperties elements should not be modified
bug.description: Currently, custom and python extension of tensor filters modifies their own GstTensorFilterProperties object based on the model file. However, this creates problems when multiple such tensor filters are used in the same pipeline with model file which have different characteristics. This information should be rather stored in the private data of the extension. cc. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jaeyun-jung>@jaeyun-jung</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2034>#2034</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
